## DatabaseConnection.executeStatement() method

Execute statement on the connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
executeStatement(sql: string): Promise<StatementResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sql | <code>string</code> | Statement SQL. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<StatementResult>`

Promise of the statement execution result. The promise is rejected if there was an error.

## Remarks

Not allowed when there is an unresolved promise returned by one of the transaction methods (in other words when the connection is in transitional transaction status).
